name: Shrinkline
description:
Welcome to SHRINKLINE! Its a beautiful world. Full of killer crabs, weird looking mushrooms that throw poisonous spores at you, And of course the HELPFUL helper always there by your side! stuck in this world you try to find your way out. And the helper is there to help!

Controls:

AD to move, SPACE to jump, CTRL to attack, uparrow to grow enlargium, downarrow to shrink enlargium
